public ref class WindowsRuntimeMarshal abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于在 .NET Framework 与 Windows 运行时之间封送数据的帮助程序方法。

span.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 "异常" 部分中的异常之外， `HRESULT` `S_OK` 基础工厂方法返回的其他任何项都将作为异常封送。In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
